""I wanted to express my gratitude for the wonderful care and education my child receives at MindChams@Buangkok. The nurturing environment and engaging activities have positively impacted their development. Thank you for your dedication and hard work!"

I would like to share my thoughts about Mindchamps @ Buangkok. My daughter has been attending this school for almost half a year. I extend my heartfelt thanks to Ms. Aly, Pang Laoshi, Ms. Jenn, Ms. Amanda, Ms. Shannon, Ms. Kana, and Ms. Helen for their exceptional care. My daughter thoroughly enjoys their curriculum, particularly the gourmet moments and music classes. We have observed positive changes in her, such as improvements in social skills and increased confidence. The school maintains excellent communication with parents through its app. They provide weekly updates on school activities and upcoming events. The facility is clean, and the overall preschool atmosphere is vibrant. I highly recommend this preschool due to its curriculum and highly qualified staff. Once again, I want to express my gratitude to Ms. Aly, Pang Laoshi, and Ms. Jenn for making the class so enjoyable. 😊

Our journey with MindChamps Buangkok began when we enrolled our eldest son, now in K2, drawn by their nurturing environment and educational philosophy that encourages not just academic excellence but also emotional and social growth. Witnessing the positive development in our son, we enrolled our daughter as soon as she turned eighteen months. The unique and compassionate approach of the MindChamps program has solidified our belief that choosing this preschool was the pinnacle decision for our children's early education. We wholeheartedly endorse MindChamps Buangkok for its exceptional commitment to nurturing young minds and hearts. Kudos to Ms Shannon, all teachers & staff. Special thanks to Ms Nur, Xiong Laoshi, Zhao Laoshi and Ms Marisah!

I'm satisfied with my decision to enrol my child in Mindchamps Buangkok ! The positive experience was thanks to a referral, and I couldn't be happier with the school. It exceeded all my expectations! The environment is very welcoming which makes me feel assured knowing that my child is growing in a nurturing space. The centre has also recently been transformed into a beautiful place for learning. Many of the teachers here also have many years of experience and they are very patient and supportive towards my child. As a new parent, the teachers will initiate to keep me inform about my child progress and I am very appreciative of that. I extend my sincere appreciation to the dedicated team at Buangkok for their unwavering commitment to excellence. Keep up the fantastic work!

We have been with Mindchamps @ Buangkok since 2019. Love the family-like environment in school. The ex-principal Ms Mable and current principal Ms Shannon have led such a great team of teachers and staff. We are so grateful for the principals, teachers, and the entire team's efforts in maintaining a nurturing environment for the children to grow.

Highly recommended! My child is currently enrolled in this centre at Popular Building. Admittedly, location accessibility is not the best, but the school bus service is very handy. What stands out the most though is the dedication of the teachers. They are passionate about teaching, caring, and nurturing my child. They are always available and keep me informed on all the fun and engaging activities that my child partakes at school. After trying many centers, my child is finally happy and excited to go to school!!

We are glad that we put our child into MindChamp@BuangKok Preschool education in Year 2023. Our child settled in just 4 days. The staffs and Principal - Ms Shannon, offer exceptional care and education for our child. MindChamp consistently updates us on school activities and promptly addresses our requests for more detailed updates. Their dedication to improvement is evident, offering valuable suggestions for our child's development. They also stand out for their careful attention to children with allergies, ensuring a safe environment for all. As my child have allergies to egg and fish. The friendly and supportive teaching and non-teaching staff create a nurturing space, and we hope to see more dedicated staffs continue to shine at MC@Buangkok, contributing to the growth of all children in the program.

Having enrolled my son in PG for close to 10 weeks, the experience has been nothing short of amazing. The teachers (those not teaching my son) also took care to remember his name and quirks etc. The principal and the admin staff are super hands on and great with their work! Communication and updates are aplenty and assuring, that’s what is most important to know what is happening in sch. Curriculum is fantastic, and that’s why we enrolled in MC too! Thanks!

Our son has been attending Mindchamps Buangkok for over 2 years - one of the best decisions we’ve made! It’s professional, well-run, with a bilingual curriculum which has certainly been enriching for our son who has grown so much in confidence and vocabulary. Most importantly our son has benefited so much from the genuine attention and care from the school’s teachers and staff. Definitely a school to consider for your little one!

I have my child enrolled in Mindchamps Buangkok and the teachers and environment there had definitely helped to develop my child's capabilities. From speech to motorskill developments, we have seen steady growth in these abilities. Teachers and staff are patient and loving to the students which brings much ease and peace of mind to parents.

Mindchamps was one of the first preschools I had finalised upon while enrolling my child mainly because of their teaching curriculum and ethos which closely resonated with ours as a family. Upon joining the Mindchamps Buangkok family I had a very smooth experience right from the school tour to actual registration. We had enrolled our kid during the pandemic and the school’s adherence to the guidelines of the MOH and general administration were superb. The teachers and staff are super friendly, transparent and genuinely good. My child loved his form teachers; the practice of moving the champs along with their form teachers throughout their transition from N1 to K2 is a brilliant strategy. My child graduated from K2 this year and I had recommended the preschool to my friends in the past and would be happy to do that in future. I wish the preschool and its lovely teachers, principal, admin and other staff continued success. It has been truly a family like experience over the past years and it is a bitter sweet feeling to part ways.

Teachers at Mindchamps Buangkok are just so warm and always welcoming be it if its their champs or with guests/vendors. They are a bunch of hardworking and at the same time fun loving teachers. It was really a good experience working with them. I highly recommend all parents to enrol their child in buangkok!!

Very impressed by the level of professionalism displayed by the team at MindChamps Buangkok. The teachers and principal are dedicated and respectful and centre facilities seem well maintained. One of the best preschools in the area

We surveyed many preschools before deciding on Mindchamps Buangkok. The environment is welcoming, the teachers, the teaching assistants and the operations staff are some of the best people we know. Mindchamps Buangkok has been a great partner in our children's education.

My children have been with Mindchamps Buangkok for 2.5 years and they enjoy going to school as the teachers and staff are very nice, understanding, patient and nurturing towards my children. My daughter is at this branch and she enjoys going school everyday. The teachers, principal, admin staff are all friendly and processional. A big Thank you to Ms Kym, Ms Beverley, Ms Lu, Ms Stella and Ms Shannon.

The teachers at Mindchamps Buangkok are truly amazing, making learning fun and positive. The school focuses on both good grades and building character, and it has proven to be a wonderful experience for our boys.

I've discovered a gem in this preschool. Their commitment to providing a supportive and engaging atmosphere for young children is truly commendable. With a team that's passionate about early childhood development, I confidently recommend this preschool to all parents seeking an exceptional start for their little ones.

I had a concern about my daughter’s development in speaking last time but after she joined mindchamp she improved a lot in learning and speaking. I am very thankful for teachers’ efforts on her. Mindchamp teachers are very patient in teaching kids and make them to improve their skillset that specially they are laking of it. Thank you teachers and team :))

This preschool creates a warm, nurturing, and enriching environment for young learners. The dedicated staff and engaging curriculum make it a top choice for parents. I wholeheartedly recommend this preschool! Thanks Ms Kym!
Safe and friendly environment. All the teachers are very responsible , passive in teaching and constantly they will provide feedback on child development.

My kid settled in quickly to Mindschamp within a week and this was the original reason why I chose them after I did a tour visit in the school. Thank you to Mindschamp staff, teachers and principals for making this an enjoyable experience for my little one at such a young age. Trust the team will continue to keep up this good work!
My kids enjoy going to preschool at MC@Buangkok. Teachers are loving and caring , and I am able to witness my children’s development through the school’s methodologies. Five stars!!

Morgan was enrolled in 2020 and we have seen him become a very sociable and interactive boy, whose love for numbers increased over the years. I would like thank all the staffs of Mindchamp Buangkok for taking such good care of Morgan and guiding him along the way. Kudos to the team, esp Miss Shannon and Miss Kym!

Both of my kids attended/attending Mindchamps in Buangkok branch. They look forward to going to school everyday. My younger one enjoys learning new stuff from teachers and playing with his friends. Academic wise, what he’s getting from preschool is way more than enough than other enrichment center outside. I will definitely recommend MC BKK to any parents out there looking for quality education!

My son has been attending Mindchamps Buangkok for the past 1.5 years. He enjoys going to childcare and has definitely learnt a lot during this period. He declares that Mindchamps is his favorite ‘enrichment’!
The environment is clean and Champs are well taken care of. Teachers go the extra mile to plan monthly outings to supplement classroom curriculum. Grateful for this awesome team!
Good Environment, teachers are all warmed and friendly, management very good as well. Great school to be in! Importantly champs are all very happy
Fun filled family day organised by the Mindchamps team. Very well done and we had lots of fun! Thank you :)

Highly recommended 👍 My son has been with MindChamps Buangkok for the past 2 years & has developed from a reserved toddler 👶 into a confident young boy 👦 Kudos to the fantastic teachers & wonderful staff of MindChamps Buangkok 😊

Recently relocated to Sengkang and was looking for a preschool for my daughter who were entering her PG stage. Had a tour visit here in MindChamps Buangkok @ Popular Building and decided this is where my elder daughter starts her PG journey. I am not the most hardworking daddy at home to sing her songs or read her books but she always came home with surprises - she learnt tons of words and multiple gestures during the 4 months, so far. My daughter loves to go to school and having a lovely relationshipn with the teachers, and what amazed me, is not limited to only her class teachers ! I can feel the love from teachers given to my daughter and I am grateful I made the right decision 4 months ago! Special shoutout to Ms Shannon to assure me that during my daughter can definitely be adapting here in the school, especially during first few days. And not forgetting Ms Stella for being helpful and always welcome my daughter in her most cheerful smile ! P/S : I visited many preschools and this is the one with lots of free parking ( at least 15 ) right in front of the building drop off. As a parents, preschools with complicated or limited parking can be a hassle especially you are rushing to work.

Definitely a great place for your kids to have fun and learn at the same time. Enrolled my child into Mindchamp Buangkok for PG class and we were amazed at the rate she has grown and developed. A safe and comfortable environment where school goes the extra mile to ensure safety for the kids (strict protocols in place for visitors and child friendly fixtures and fittings) and sanitisation being done at common area regularly. Artworks done by the child were displayed around the school to showcase and create inviting environment for the child when they enter school compound. Dedicated and inspiring teachers who spent extra efforts in decorating the classrooms to fit the theme of the lesson plan. Regular update are sent to parents on the development progress of the child with reports and pictures. A good mixture of engaging, fun and systematic curriculums allows the child to get hands on experiences where my child enjoyed very much. Though there are no outdoor area within the school, there is a huge gym area for their lessons and there are also the monthly excursions for the child to explore and relate their classroom learnings to real life experience. The principal and administrative staff are also very accommodating and responsive to the needs of the parents. Besides the class teachers, the school principal also makes effort to speak to parents during drop off and pick up timings to strengthen the school and parents partnership in developing the child. With the positive development on my elder child, my younger child will also commence school at Mindchamp Buangkok shortly. Having seen and heard a lot of stories from my friends enrolling their child at other places, I’m confident to recommend that MC Buangkok is a place where you can enrol your child to with no regrets!

I'm the Parent Engagement A.Mgr from HQ. Have stationed myself in this centre most of the time and observed how engaging Ms Shannon and her team are towards the champs as well as to the parents. Not only they take good care of the champs in school, I am well taken care of too, they make sure I have my lunch whenever I'm at the centre for visit appointments. Thank you Ms Shannon, the wonderful teachers and aunties! Because of the WOW experience I have here, I'm always looking forward to all my centre visit appointments in MindChamps @ Buangkok. Connect with me @ 83284201 or IG : preschool_jean to schedule a school visit, I'll be very happy to show you the centre and share with you more about Ms Shannon and her team!
This school provides a fantastic setting for children to learn and grow. The caring staff and thoughtful programs ensure a bright start for every child.

did my practicums here in MindChamps Buangkok as a trainee teacher here & i really enjoyed myself! the school environment is clean and safe, and the principal & teachers are always warm and willing to go the extra mile. a great environment for young children to learn and develop.

Incredible journey with the MC Buangkok family so far. There was one day when we were both caught in a jam but the teachers were very understanding and stayed on to keep our daughter company. Our daughter always looks excited to go to school. She recently comes home singing new songs which we have never taught her before. She obviously learnt it at school. Grateful to all the teachers and staff here!

The teacher and the teaching environment meet my expectations. The teaching philosophy is excellent, and from what I have observed, the children are very loving. My child also really likes this school. The only regret is the lack of outdoor space.
The teachers are amazing and the curriculum is awesome! Love the events and outdoor trips that all teachers put their hearts into planning too!
My kid enjoy going to school everyday, great preschool!
My kids are enrolled with them. Great place for the children.. teachers are generally passionate about teaching and growing my children. Place is clean and tidy which is what I'm particular about

Eleanor has been with the school for a good 6months now and she is loving it! Had just attended MC read and write (Chinese) workshop presented by Ren Laoshi earlier this evening and gained pretty good ideas and knowledge on how we are able to also bond whilst cultivating our kid’s interest / habit in reading. A very well structured workshop. Thank you for the effort, appreciate it very much!

What really attracted me to this place among other schools and even other outlets of the same school is that I get the feeling that the teachers in this outlet really like kids. The whole school feels like a family, all the teachers know all the children even if they the children are not in their class.

My child has been attending MindChamps Buangkok for a while now, and we've been very impressed by the quality of care & education provided. The teachers are all incredibly patient and attentive to each child's individual needs. Overall, we feel incredibly fortunate to have found such a wonderful preschool for our child. It's clear that the staff truly cares about the well-being & education of each child, and we couldn't be happier with our experience here!
The school has good teachers and curriculum. My kid has learned a lot since joining MindChamps PreSchool @ Buangkok

To Our Wonderful Ms Ng, Ren Lao Shi, and Ho Lao Shi, A heartfelt thank you for your dedication, patience, and love in shaping Luca’s early years. Your creativity and nurturing have ignited his curiosity and set him on a path of learning. The safe and vibrant environment MindChamps family created is invaluable. Your impact reaches far beyond the classroom, and for that, we are truly grateful. Thank you for being exceptional educators and role models. We also like to express our gratitude to the support staffs for taking good care of Luca. With heartfelt appreciation, Wilson & Ezanne.
teachers’ dedication to creating a nurturing and stimulating environment for young learners is evident in everything they do. The team's passion for early childhood development shines through.

Switching my child over to MCBKK was one of the best decisions we have made for him slightly after he turned 3 last Oct! We were initially worried if he could adapt to a new environment as he was previously with another school since 5 months old, but we would find out soon we were worrying unduly once he switched over! The teachers and staffs at MCBKK were very professional and constantly update us about the happenings in school. They have nurtured my child to be more independent and most importantly, he is very proud of his school! He would jump with joy and said 'Mindchamps is my school!' whenever we saw other outlets at SC. Special shoutout to all his teachers who have taught him before since N1! Thank you all teachers and staffs of MCBKK for your commitment and patience towards our children !!

Enrol my child into MindChamps Buangkok. The teachers are always going the extra mile for my child and they are passionate with their work. Always coming up with new ideas to unlock the potentials of the children in the school. Thanks MindChamps@Buangkok for the wonderful guidance !!!!
This preschool is a gem! I've seen firsthand how they provide a nurturing and stimulating environment for young learners. It's a place where children thrive, and I highly recommend it.
Great sharing by the teacher during Chinese reading class. Thank you teacher love & support to the kids.

We have wonderful experience with Mindchamps Buangkok! Amanda loves it so much that she doesn’t want any other school! She has been with mindchamps for more than a year now, and has shown tremendous improvement both academically and personally. We like enquiry teaching the most, it nurtures intellectual curiosity with engaging activities. Amanda is always excited to share with us what she has learnt and discovered in the school every day she comes home. The teachers are amazing! We are very impressed with their passion and dedication! Amanda can read and write independently now, and her general knowledge has improved so much after being with the school. Apart from academic, the teachers also develop her into a socially responsible and confident individual. We are very thankful to mindchamps team!

Amazing and caring teachers! A very nurturing environment that embraces the fact that every kid is different and unique. Dedication of teachers and principal is evident in the day to day communications and the care and love they shower on the children.

Our twins have been attending MindChamps Buangkok since they were 18 months old, and we've seen how much they have grown through the teaching and setting. The teachers have always done their best to help and support them when they needed it. As always, we are extremely pleased with the school and encourage any prospective students or parents to visit.
Great school with passionate and caring teachers! Enrichment courses are embedded in daily schedule, monthly field trips really excite my kids.
Teachers are nice and caring! They ensure kids are well taken care of and always have a smile on their face!
My kids enjoy their time in school. They like the big Gym playgorund. Teachers are loving and nice towards them.
A loving centre for my child, she really likes it. And they have resourceful books for children.

MindChamps PreSchool @ Buangkok takes great pride in their operations on a day to day and it is no surprise that its operations and security is run like a well oiled-machine. This is important for us as parents. Our kids have been well groomed patrons at this centre for years and despite the high turnover rate of educators, its gradually stabilizing and reaching at a performance peak. Let's just say you get what you pay for and I am highly grateful to mindchamps buangkok for its staff, educators and principal (not forgetting the buildings facility and bus operators) for all they have done to make the entire experience almost flawless and high quality. We like the personal touch of the place and clean, well maintained levels of sustenance. Kudos!
Felt that Ollie was well taken care of here by the teachers and I feel assured as a parent. He’s always cheerful when he comes home. Thank you Mindchamps

Our child has been attending school at MindChamps Buangkok for over a year now. We are glad that she has been has been exposed to different lessons: from learning literacy to self-expression to music lessons to Chinese characters recognition to even making her own sandwich! Many of such things we working parents would not have the time nor the creativity to know what to teach and how to share. Phew! At least our kid learns much when she is at school.
teachers are warm and professional. it's a wonderful place for kids! 10/10 will recommend to all parents!

Great and clean environments. Teachers and staffs are patience, hardworking, and details. My son has been attending the school since he was 18 months old. We are so glad we made the right choice. I really appreciate everything he has learned from the school. We are always surprised with his knowledge. When he just started school, he cannot speak. Now he can express and share his feelings and needs with us. Do some simple things by himself. Sing the song he learned from School. Really want to say thank you to MindChamps Buangkok Team. Thank you so much for keeping Eden happily entertained, loved, and cared for during the day.
Well managed school with a high level of standard for preschool kids. Very happy with our sons performance in mindchamps Buangkok. Special mention to teacher Alyssa 👍🏻 thanks guys!

Our daughter commenced her journey at Mindchamps Buangkok ("MCBKK") since N1 way back in early 2019. She participated and we just attended her K2 graduation ceremony 3 weeks back and she will be leaving Mindchamps as a confident and articulate "K3" to start her P1 formal education very shortly. During the course of the last 4 years, both my wife and I have much to thank the whole team at MCBKK principle, teachers and support staff. It is inevitable that there will always be turnover for any childcare though I know MCBKK will try their best to retain and replace. Kids are also more resilient than what most parents think and adapt quickly. Nonetheless as I reflect, would I have trusted my daughter with MCBKK all over again? The answer is a definite "yes' for the following reasons. - Great partnership between parents and entire MCBKK team, bus driver and bus auntie included. - Genuine and professional teachers and staff who really care and bother - Clean, bright and cheerful environment - Holistic educational experience that covers English, Chinese, Math, reading, writing, physical education, art, gourmet, performance and music just to name some. - Honest and timely feedback from teachers - Supportive fellow parents and wonderful classmates Covid was a trying period for all of us and I could appreciate the amount of consideration, stress and work that went behind as the MCBKK team tried to maintain a safe and healthy environment for the kids while keeping up with their programme. Special mention Ms Ng, Ms Yun, Ms Shannon, Ms Mabel, Ms Beth, Ms Amanda, Ms Cass, Ms Fu, Ms Stella and ex-teachers Ms Eileen and Ms Zhang Qian. A big Thank You to all of you! All of you have been instrumental in one way or another for our child's growing up journey. We are always grateful and appreciative and definitely like to share our gratitude and experience with any parents who are currently in their taunting process of selecting a pre-school for their little ones. There is no perfect pre-school but only the most suitable one. For us, we are happy to have partnered MCBKK for our child's journey.  She will be all ready for P1 in a few days' time. :-)
Very good environment and teachers that teach with their heart, highly recommend MindChamps buangkok to all parents, our daughter love everything here. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

The whole brain training championed by Mindchamps has worked well for my children in honing their academic and lingustic skills, sometimes I'm taken aback by the abilities my children have gained through their time at Mindchamps Buangkok which has a great team. And the brief exposure through Mindchamp's music curriculum seems to have made the miraculous difference.

My son has been attending Mindchamps Buangkok for the past 1 year plus and we are really glad that we chose this preschool. He cannot speak or utter a single word when he first joined there, but under the care and guidance of the team, he is an expressive, active little boy now and likes to talk about anything under the sun in English and Mandarin! I would like to thank Miss Shannon, Miss Kym, Miss Ren and the rest of the team for taking such good care of him. The school has brought out his musical talents as well. I did not know that he likes to sing and has good rhythm in music! I am very assured that he is in good hands when he is there. Well done, Team Mindchamp Buangkok!
Awesome school with a lively vibe. Happy teachers with confident children. Great place to be in!

Nice School. Principle is a very nice and responsible lady. And Teachers are patient，lovely and nice to kids . They always pay attention to kids and parents demand and and answer inquiries patiently. kids always love to go to school .
The perfect environment for my little one to learn and have fun! Special thanks to all the mindchamps buangkok teachers!
Amazing environment with lovely teachers! We love teacher kym, highly recommended.

It has been tremendous growth for my son since his return from overseas; though it was just a period of 7 months. Through the patience and guidance of Miss Ng/ 云老师, my son is now able to read / write more confidently than before. I recalled when he first joined, his english writings were still shaky and he couldn't even write a single chinese word. If not for my overseas assignment and we relocating, I would surely hope to see him finishing his K2 at mindchamp and getting ready for his Primary education. Once again, we appreciate the patience, love and guidance rendered to my son.
Great environment and teachers. My son is truly happy going to Mindchamp here.

It's the school holidays and we have been sending our son for holiday programmes to enrich his time. Last school holiday he attended MindChamps Actors Centre Kids Bootcamp and he was having a blast! The trainer is so engaging and he returns home each day excited about all that he did and learned during the session. MindChamps runs this bootcamp every school holiday. He is attending the 5-day programme for 3 1/2 hrs each day. He was supposed to attend this year but due to the current situation, he might just have to wait for next year but it's worth the wait.
Nice teachers and good school. My kid loves school and enjoys classes with his classmates

Very clean and well maintained center. Extremely responsive to queries. Both my children study here. Must applaud the teachers, support staff and management for their efforts . The teachers are very hardworking and diligently answer all queries regarding the kids. My son's (k2) Chinese teacher even took efforts to write notes on my son's performance and thanked me for the practice at home (we r non-chinese) . Also, my daughters Chinese teacher (PG) gave my daughter chinese flashcards with English to practice at home. Very impressive.. The teachers just don't so their job as a job. They take it more personal and are soo involved in the child's development . Even on the lines of character development, the teacher (k1 & k2) helps out during class to mould their behavior if you request them on specific aspects. Would like to thank all the teachers and staffs for doing a fantastic job. Overall will surely recommend mindchamps @buangkok!
The school has such a friendly and warm vibe. Very enriching as well.

After months of searching for a preschool for my daughter, I have finally found Mindchamps Buangkok to be our preferred choice in this neighborhood. Likely to be one of the best that offers an all-rounded curriculum and one with personalized feedback . We have seen a significant progression in our daughter's learning journey since she was transferred from another preschool at N1 last year. One example is that my daughter is able to recognise her name and write it independently now. Kudos to the dedicated team that Principal Shannon leads. Their parent-teacher communication is clear and also insightful in understanding our daughter's personal growth, which is helpful to her growth not only in school but also at home. The school also organizes monthly field trips that align with its curriculum, which is fantastic because the kids not only learn within a classroom setting but also experience it in a more practical setting. Special shout out to the teachers, Ms. Kym, Fu laoshi, Ren laoshi, Ms. Cass, and Ms. Beverley & supporting staff for making my daughter, Klary, preschool's journey a fulfilling one.
Fun sports day for parent child bonding!
Great environment with loving teachers that aim to nurture our next generation.
Sufficient parking lots and space , which is important for for parents ferrying children to school.
Excellent outdoes family activities
Nice atmosphere and condusive environment! Kym is amazing!
The teachers are very nice and patient! Recommend!
Fun and interesting. Thanks!
Kids enjoy and learn a lot at Mindchamps!
My Sonny had a great childhood experience here!
Fantastic learning experience for my girls!
Fun day
I love school and my teachers!
MindChamps Buangkok is the top choice for every parent!
Wonderful teachers and staff!
I like the exposure given to my kids
The school staff are friendly！
Good"

"The centre is well-managed - the management oftentime takes practical actions after receiving feedback on improvements, which impresses me. I like it that the Centre Directors Desmond and Stacey and their team partner with us parents closely in our children's development, and engage us with sincerity. My kids love their teachers (form teachers Ms Cheryl, Ms Mira, 江老师 and 岑老师, enrichment teachers Ms Nat, Ms Rina and Ms Bee, and ATs Ms Susan, Ms Arina, Ms Aman etc), and very often talk about them, their classmates and what they learnt. In terms of facilities and offerings, MC Bishan is also one of the firsts which introduced the music enrichment programmes, and provided indoor playground and water park, as well as a semi-outdoor garden. It has been 3 years since my eldest joined MC Bishan. Happy that my kids are in good hands and are enjoying their school days in this vibrant and caring environment.

Our child started in this centre since PG, December 2020. Educators are experienced and knowledgeable in handling the children. Kids are enjoying with peers thru lots of social interaction activities. Lots of hands on learning activities such as craft works and writing skills. Lots of fun on celebration such as CNY, NDP, Racial harmony, Deepavali, Halloween and Christmas 🎄 Amazing staff with so much heart and caring mindset. Our child always tells us that he likes his teachers and classmates. As parents, we are continuously amazed at how much our child has learned and grown. Nice and cosy environment. The school has its own indoor: water play area, playground, garden, and also there is an amazing huge and colourful gym room with fully covered mat for the kids.

My son has recently joined Mindchamps Bishan and I would like to express my utmost satisfaction and gratitude for the incredible experience my son has had at the center. In less than three months, I've witnessed a remarkable transformation in my son's adaptability and understanding of MindChamps values. His enthusiasm for going to school is truly heartening, and he consistently brings home a wealth of knowledge that has opened up new avenues for us to bond and engage in meaningful conversations. The positive impact of MindChamps Bishan on my son's development is evident, and I commend your team for creating such a nurturing and stimulating environment. The dedication to instilling values and fostering a love for learning is truly commendable. Thank you for the outstanding work you do at MindChamps Bishan. It brings immense joy to see my son thriving in such a supportive educational setting.

My daughter has been with them since she was 18 months old, and the transformation is remarkable. From not being able to speak much, she can now sing fluently in both English and Mandarin at just 2 years old. She genuinely enjoys attending school every day and has thrived under the guidance of her teachers. I appreciate the thoughtful design of individual classrooms, which minimizes the risk of virus spread among the kids. Additionally, the facility offers a two-storey indoor playground, water play, and an indoor garden, providing a stimulating and safe environment for the children.

Our child has been in Mindchamps Bishan for 1 year plus. Since the transfer to MC Bishan, her interest in Chinese and her ability to speak in Mandarin has improved tremendously. MC bishan has an all inclusive curriculum, children are exposed to general knowledge, science, music, gym class and these classes are of quality. my child is able to play some songs on her toy xylophone after learning about music notes in school, we did not send her for music class before. At preschool age, she is also taught things such as different countries’ cultures, and she remembers them well even after some time suggesting teachers review previous topics periodically and practises in- depth teaching. We are also satisfied with the frequent and detailed updates and useful reminders from school on what was taught in class, and what is coming up ahead. Thank you for providing my child such enriching learning experience! i will recommend others to consider MC at Bishan.

My son had joined Mindchamps PreSchool @ Bishan since PG, because my elder daughter was an alumini of the preschool. My wife and I have seen the progress of our son, from a shy and reserved little boy, to now being able to speak up what's on his mind. Although it has not been a smooth journey throughout, but we were glad his teachers were patient and helpful with him. We know he is in good hands when we send him to the preschool every weekday. It is a bit sad that he will graduate at the end of next year, but we believe he will definitely enjoy his final year and all the time that he had spent with his classmates and teachers in this preschool.

My daughter has been attending Mindchamps since 2020. I've seen first hand the dedication and love that teachers at various levels have shown to her. From academics to self help skills, they've patiently helped her every step of the way. I really like that the turnover of the teachers are very low and the focus on activities outside of academics such as water play, violin, gym is also key to the well rounded development of my daughter.

I wanted to express my gratitude for the wonderful job the school and teachers are doing with my boy. He is thriving under the teachers’ guidance, and it’s heartening to see his growth and development. Everyday my boy will share with me how much he loves his teachers and the lessons he enjoys, and the things the teachers shared with them. Thank you mindchamp @ Bishan team! Your patience, and ability to engage the children are truly commendable. Thank you for your dedication to fostering a love of learning in Julian!

Mindchamps Bishan is a great choice for my two kids and family. Alice, Desmond and the teachers partner with us to help create a supportive and encouraging environment for my kids to grow. More than the progress they have made in music, academic reading, writing and numbers, they have found mental growth. This is evident in how they both are now confident, happy and able to overcome challenges. I thank the teaching team for a wonderful curriculum that balances all areas of their development and look forward to many years more with Mindchamps Bishan!

My little one has been with MindChamps Bishan since 18 months. it is a rewarding journey as my Little one enjoys school so much. Teachers are constantly giving feedback to us and we will work together with the teachers to achieve his milestones. Thank you!

My boy has been with MindChamps since N1. He enjoys school and loves his teacher. Special mention to 董老师, who is very caring and patient. The facilities are also excellent, my boy look forward to every session of water play and the indoor playground. No regrets for choosing MindChamps :)

My son has been attending Mindchamp preschool since October and he's always looking forward to school. I have seen how he grew over the past few months to become more independent, vocal and inquisitive. The teachers, admin staffs and management are also very responsive, friendly and helpful.

My daughter has been attending MindChamps for the past 1 year. She is always very happy to go to school and improve tremendously in her speech. She used to speak so little that she needs to see a therapist, now this is the last of my worry. Environment and curriculum are great too and I'm glad that I made this choice.

MindChamps Bishan has been an incredible choice for my child. The fantastic teachers have created a welcoming atmosphere where my son feels cherished and excited to learn. Their dedication and care have made a significant impact, fostering a genuine love for learning in my child.

Last year, we visited a few preschools in the midview city area and found Mindchamps to be really impressive. The campus is big and clean. There are a number of facilities within the school: indoor playground, water playground, gym and music class. The centre head Mr Desmond gave a good introduction to the school and he was very patient at answering questions. The curriculum sounded really good so we decided to enrol our son in. We originally planned to let our son start PG in December this year but due to sudden changes in caretaking availability, we urgently needed help. Thankfully the school was able to accommodate us and let our boy in earlier by a month. Thank you to vice principal Ms Alice for helping us with this urgent request. We appreciate this very much. I accompanied my boy for his first 2 days of school and found that the teachers there are really nurturing and dedicated. As my boy has not attended school before, I was initially worried about him adapting to school life. My boy’s class teachers Ms Jocelyn Tan and 郭老师 were very assuring. Following through the class, I could see that they are very caring and engaged with the children really well. They also took time to report on my child’s status and the activities they carried out. I can feel that my son is in safe hands. After one month of school, my son has settled in well. I also noticed my son verbalizing a lot more words and became more independent. For this, I must commend the efforts of the teachers and the school for providing such a nurturing environment. It was a good choice to put him in this school.

We chanced upon Mindchamps preschool @ Midview a year ago and thought we will enrol our son here as it looked big (with both indoor playground and water playground) and clean, and a good curriculum. Having been here for one year, I must say that we have been so lucky to have accidentally chanced upon this gem! The teachers, vice-principal, principal and assistants are so dedicated and amazing. From drop off to pick up, I have never seen a place so efficient. This school does not only facilitate learning but learning through play (especially with gourmet class!). My son has learnt so much in the last year. He also settled in well with the help of everyone. Special thanks to Ms Hazirah, 陈老师 and 钱老师。 Last but not least, the infection control in this school is also great!

My 2 kids have been with Mindchamps Bishan since they were 18 months old, and I have seen how much they have grown and learnt over the past few years. In particular, their Mandarin has improved by leaps and bounds though we hardly speak Mandarin at home. I also like that their turnover rate is very low, and the teachers who taught my eldest are still around and end up teaching my younger one as well. It feels like Mindchamps Bishan is watching us grow as a family, and also growing alongside us. A great shout-out to all the teachers and staff of Mindchamps Bishan for making the school such a safe and fun place for the kids to grow up in!

School looks great, playgrounds are lots of fun. Well meaning parents wanting to secure a space for your kids - take note. The school requires you to pay $70 fee to show sincerity in your interest and get onto the waitlist but when an opening is available, you may or may not be notified. Which was my case. Apparently, the sincerity is not reciprocal.

We have selected and stayed with MindChamps Bishan since PG, for a number of reasons, from caring and attentive teachers to facilities such as double storey indoor playground, indoor water play area, garden, and an elaborate lesson plan ranging from reading and writing to music lessons such as playing the recorder, keyboard and violin. I appreciate such exposure for my kids at an early age. A good balance between academic and soft skills development for my children. Thank you creating a conducive learning environment.

Enrolling my daughter in Mindchamps Bishan is definitely the right choice that we had made as parents. The teachers are so caring towards all the children and makes learning very fun for the kids. My daughter enjoys going to school!
My son had attended MindChamps Bishan for almost 2 years and he enjoys going to school. The teachers made it a very lively and fun environment for the champs such that my son loves going to school.

My son has been attending the school since he was in play group and he always looks forward to gg to school and loves his teachers. The curriculum is comprehensive and they have an amazing environment with a mini water play and indoor playground.

We were impressed about the year-end concert, and my K1 kid enjoyed it so much! It is amazing that the young children (including N2 to K2) were able to present the great show so well with undoubtedly great guidance and patience from the teachers. Practice makes perfect! We were so moved and proud of how much progress that our kids have made during 2023 and are simply looking forward to another great year ahead with Mindchamps Bishan! The N1 teachers are very caring and attentive to the children. The staff at Mindchamps Bishan take parents’ feedback seriously and act promptly to address and clear any concerns that they may have, which has been truly helpful! The facilities in Mindchamps Bishan are also very good so that the children can enjoy their time either in the gym room, the playground or the water play, to develop different skills which are important in their overall growth! My younger kid had a fantastic year of great learning experience and he simply loves going to school now!

Mindchamps Bishan has excellent facilities. I love that they have a garden for the children to be close to nature. I love that they have a water play park for children to have fun in the wet! All these in an indoor environment 👍 My son has grown in his mindset and behaviour tremendously with caring guidance from his Chinese teacher 吴娜娜老师. I am very pleased and thankful for the carefully crafted curriculum and champion mindset culture.

In Aug 2023, I wanted to send my little one to MC bishan and went for their guided school tour. After the tour, MC Bishan insisted that a monetary deposit was required to be transferred to them for a queue position on the waitlist. At that point, there was 1 child ahead of mine on the wait list. Hence, the chance of enrolling with MC Bishan seemed to be very promising. After payment, months past and there were no calls, no messages and no updates from the school with regards to the waitlist position. I assumed there were no spaces available. To my disbelief, I found out that there were 2 new students (same age as my little one) that were NOT on the waitlist at all and got enrolled on the spot in December 2023. This was very disappointing that MC Bishan enrolls their students at their whims and fancies, disregarding the long wait list with parents who have paid deposits. Beware of their waitlist!

Our child loves the teachers and classmates in school. Every day after school, he tells us excitedly what he has experienced in school. We are very glad that he is very happy in school, to us that is the most important thing.

MindChamps @bishan is conducive for learning with many different types of facilities and with a team of caring teachers. The communication is open and information from the school is readily shared with parents. My children have learnt a lot and progressed in terms of their intellectual and social skills. The school is conveniently located in Midview city, making drop offs and pick ups a breeze for parents!

My girl is in the playgroup class and has learnt a lot in the last few months. Teachers are also caring and very responsive. Special thanks for Ms priscy and Li laoshi for taking such good care of our children!
A great pre-school, Our kid loves it! Teachers are patientand knowledgeable, always able to address parents' concerns. There's been a remarkable progress on our little Champ!

My son at N1c in Mindchamps from July, i can see his improvement for theses months. For example: his language capability,, communication skill, and knowledge gaining. Thank you Ms. Mira&Ms. Cen and all Mindchamps teachers and staffs.

We are so glad that we made the correct decision to send our kid to mindchamps pre school. We are impressed by how much our kid can learn from here. The teachers and staff are all very caring and helpful.
My son has been attending Mindchamps at Midview for the last 3 years and we are very happy with his progress! He looks forward to going to school everyday!

Both of my kids go to Mindchamps @ Bishan. It’s a great preschool with everything we can possibly imagine: there’s a big space playground, water playground, gardens etc. The teaching staff is awesome, they teach with patience and passion, and they genuinely care about the children. We are really impressed that every teacher in the school knows the name of each kid and their idiosyncrasies. Both of our kids love going to school and enjoy what they do in school.

The Mindchamps Bishan Team are rock-stars! They are attentive to my child's learning, requests and habits, and we've seen my child grow in knowledge and also personality. In particular, Ms Mira and Cen Laoshi and the school's management are always very responsive to our questions and concerns, and are keen to work closely with parents to ensure that the child's development goes beyond just the classroom and lesson time.

Our family has been very impressed with MindChamps at Bishan Midview city in the short time our child has been here. We are greatly appreciative to the Principal Mr Desmond who spent a lot of time bringing us around the Centre patiently and sincerely answering all our questions! Subsequently, the enrollment process was fuss-free, giving us a lot of confidence in the management’s organized way of doing things. Our child is enjoying school; programs seem well-planned and most importantly to us, we have a caring Li 李 Wanying 老师 to thank for helping our child adapt smoothly to the school (minimal crying that settled after two short weeks). 李老师 has been sending us detailed daily updates on our child’s progress, taking time to reassure and answer any of us caregivers’ questions at pickup as well. We are so impressed with 李老师’s, and the other MC Midview staff’s, professionalism and look forward to our child attending school everyday now!

We enrolled our son at Mindchamps Bishan when he turned 18 months, and whilst it’s only been a couple of months, we feel that the teachers have been exceptionally attentive to his needs :) kudos to his form teachers Ms Arina and 冯老师 / 仲老师, and also others like 钱老师 and the rest of the network for helping us with timely updates and helping to settle him in everyday even when he cries at drop off! We particularly enjoy the weekly updates via the app and are exceptionally grateful for the care we got during the first two weeks where we had daily updates. There have also been safety measures put in place during check in. School is new both for the child and us parents but we felt like we were in good hands throughout. Thank you!

I will say Mindchamps @Bishan preschool is a great choice. My child is happy there every day and he make some true friends in his class. He become confident and want to share his thoughts. The teachers share their daily activities quite often so we know exactly what happen in school. Highly recommend!

Beware the $70 waitlist. It's a great education facility, but if it's a full-house for your kid's level, they may ask you to pay $70 to be added to a waitlist. ** Read this then make up your mind** If it was a waitlist that works like normal waitlists (a vacancy becomes available, next-in-line gets a slot), then great! But I'm aware of people who have managed to cut queue without even joining the waitlist at all. Same level as my kid, same full house they should have encountered. If I didn't know the kid who (unknowingly) cut the queue, I'd still be (foolishly) waiting today. If this school is knowingly taking money and not fulfilling their end of the deal, sounds like a scam to me. If there are loopholes in their system, that's plain incompetence. I have no evidence either way, but neither way is acceptable to me as a parent. Guess I take my money and child elsewhere.

My son has been attending preschool here for the last few months and he has been enjoying himself immensely. Since starting school, his vocabulary has increased and he has learnt new skills that amazes both my husband and myself. The teachers are also very experienced, friendly and genuinely caring towards their students. The school also has impeccable hygiene standards, frequent updates which provide peace of mind for parents, and such great facilities like the water play area which my son loves. We have no regrets sending our son here and I look forward to sending my other kids here too when they are old enough. Thank you Mindchamps @Bishan!

My daughter loves going to school, she asked if she can go school on the weekend because she misses school. The classroom is spacious, gym, playground and water play provide ample space for free play and motor skill development. The music class is also one of her favourite, and I love that she sings the tune of the songs she learned from the school at home spontaneously. The curriculum is well designed and teachers are loving & caring . She loves the school food as well. The menu is well designed to be nutritious and tasty, she ate very well and have grown a lot since we enrolled her in Mindchamp Bishan. Thanks to the staff and teachers for doing a great job proving a nurturing environment for the kids to learn and develop happily.
My daughter enjoys going to school. The teachers are lovely and patient and the water play area and space gym is a bonus!

My daughter has been studying at MindChamps for 6 months, and her progress has been remarkable. She has developed independence, formed friendships, and become braver and stronger. The teachers and assistants are friendly and patient, and we are satisfied with the facilities and curriculum design. It’s a highly recommended institution.
My daughter is with MindChamps @ Midview. The teachers are very assuring and very passionate. Currently satisfied with the school and teachers.
Positive experience with my elder child. Good teachers, staff and facilities. Just enrolled my 2nd child also with MindChamp Preschool.

Our girl has been with Mindchamps Bishan ever since she’s 18 months and she love every moment spent there especially the weekly water play (which she super love the most)! Of course there will be times she would prefer to stay home instead of going to school but kudos to Ms Alice and the teachers who always have a way to coax her and ensure she has a safe and fun day there. Our girl loves her teachers so much -Ms Mira , Cen Lao Shi, Ms Nat, assistant teacher Ms Susan (just to name a few), and we are thankful for them for being so patient and kind to our girl.

All my children look forward to attending school daily. Mindchamps Preschool has a very comprehensive curriculum, including the music curriculum. My children learnt and grew alot through MC@Bishan. The K2 champs are well prepared for P1 and it was a breeze for my eldest to transit to primary school. The teachers are caring and nurturing. Thank u for providing such a great and loving educational environment!

This is definitely one of the best mindchamps centres in Singapore with awesome dedication all the way from the center owners to the teachers in giving the children the best preschool experience. The facilities are top notch after the expansion with indoor playground, garden and even a water park! Thank you teachers for making Daniel’s preschool experience a very memorable one!

It was a great learning journey for both my child and us as parents with mindchamps preschool. The curriculum is certainly outstanding among other preschools and the staffing here is carefully crafted and designed. Not to mention the dedicated team that consists of expertise from different youth education field. Highly recommended to all parents if can afford, no need to hesitate.

This review is long time due. We have such a wonderful experience with mindchamps Bishan Midviewcity. We did a thorough research before choosing this school and we are extremely happy with my daughters progress. She is now more open, social, friendly with good manners. She is thriving under the care of her teachers. Special shout out to her teachers Ms Stella, Ms Jo Yee, Ms Angela, Ms Yu Wei. Also the support staff who are always welcoming with a smile. Thank you Desmond, Alice and all teachers and staff for providing a safe and caring environment for the kids to grow in.

Mindchamp bishan is a really good childcare school. our child not only learned lot of knowledge but also forms a character for caring, courage, kind and thoughtful. The teacher and staff are also very nice and warming. when our child cries or annoys, they always very patient and can calm down the child. Good job! And thank you!

This Mindchamps branch is excellent! Ms Cheryl and Jiang Laoshi fr K1C always keeps us parents updated with what’s going on in class and are prompt to answer any questions. They are easily contactable through the app so there’s peace of mind when dropping off the kids at school. My kids love going through their own photos, telling me what happened in school and introducing their friends to me. The food is very healthy and yummy too so I never have to worry that my kids are not eating well in school.

My kids have been with MC Bishan as soon as they turn 18mths. It’s my oldest’s final year with them so I guess I’m in a good position to review 😆 I have also lost count of the number of people I’ve referred in the last 5 years. The one thing that makes this childcare outstanding is - They truly put the children first! When they do that, everything else falls into place: the type of teachers they hire, the decisions management makes and eventually, the crowd they attract. All these coupled with the solid curriculum of the MindChamps group. So if you have bad experience with another MindChamps school before, please don’t think that they are all alike, because they are not. It’s all down to the management of each centre.

It was very nice to receive our very first termly report on our child's (TL) progress in his first 10 weeks at MindChamps. How time flies. We thought it is only apt that we would like to write this letter to express our gratitude and appreciation for all the wonderful things Ms Arina and 冯老师 have done as preschool teachers. Their passion, dedication, and commitment to shaping the minds and lives of young children is truly admirable, and we are grateful for the positive impact they have had on our little one. From the moment little TL started attending their class, it was clear that they are not just a teacher, but also a caring and nurturing mentor They have a gift for making every child feel valued, heard, and supported, which is so important in building their confidence and self esteem. Their patience, kindness, and enthusiasm have helped our little TL develop a love for learning and a sense of curiosity about the world around him. He would come home singing the songs he learned "Ee i ee I o..". We can tell how attached he is towards Ms Arina and 冯老师. They would patiently coax him to nap and have their ways of comforting him. Their creativity and imagination in designing age appropriate activities and lessons have made learning fun and engaging for him. We are constantly amazed by the projects and crafts little TL works on (from the many photos shared by both teachers), and how much he has grown in his cognitive and motor skills. Their abilities to tailor their teaching to each child's unique needs and learning style is truly remarkable, and we are grateful for the individual attention and care they give to him. As parents, we know that we can trust them to provide a safe and nurturing environment for our little one. Their communication and collaboration with us have been invaluable in keeping us informed about little TL's progress and development. We truly appreciate their willingness to listen to our concerns and feedback, and to provide suggestions and work with us in supporting his growth and development. On a special note, we would also like to extend our appreciation to 钱老师 whose presence is always able to calm little TL down at the daily morning reception. Many times, she would be sharp to notice his eyes welling up and will always be able to provide comfort and a change of emotions in him (and probably in us parents too). In short, we would like to thank them for being exceptional preschool teachers. Their impact on our little one's life and education will be felt for years to come, and we are forever grateful for the role they have played in shaping his future. Their hard work and dedication have not gone unnoticed, and we hope they know how much they are appreciated. C & K, Parents of little TL (PG)
My kid has the best time at school. Teachers are great and the Bishan pre-school has some of the best facilities - indoor gym, water park, indoor garden to facilitate fun learning and play.

A great learning space for children with friendly staff! My children enjoy their time being here and look forward to going to school everyday. My youngest daughter even took out her uniform on weekends and wanted to go school!
both children in mindchamps since n2. management and teachers are very responsive and open to feedback :)

Words cannot express our gratitude towards the teachers and staff at MindChamps PreSchool who have been a part of our family for 3 years and counting. Our children have learnt so much and continue to share with us the activities that they did at “school”. Their social skills improved, and they have become more confident and independent each day. They developed a rich vocabulary and are progressing well in phonological awareness, Chinese and numeracy concepts. MindChamps PreSchool provides a wonderful, supportive and nurturing environment where children can learn and explore through play. Our elder son, has benefitted from his preschool years at MindChamps – with all the skills that he has gained, he is now a confident child in primary one. We truly enjoyed our MindChamps PreSchool experience and would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a warm and welcoming preschool.

Both my kids are loving every school day with mindchamps@bishan. They have been with other branches but this is the best so far in terms of the school teachers, the directors and cleanliness. It's the little things that the centre directors and teachers do that makes this place warm your heart and that you know they really care about the children. 110% recommend this branch!

After attending MindChamps Bishan, Lucius has become more confident and curious about the world around him. Lucius especially loves the new water playground and music lessons. We really appreciate Ms Erra, Dong Lao Shi and the rest of the staff at Mindchamps for making him feel at home! Thank you! ☺️

My boy really loves going to school and playing with his frens. Even on holiday, he also miss his frens. The environment in MIndschamp in bishan is really great. Teachers are all really patient and caring. Child: Lucius woo (N2C)
With the water playground, garden, huge playground, MindChamps Bishan has got to be the Champ in making students look forward to school every day!
The teachers in Bishan MindChamps are all quite nice. I’m very happy that my son is always with good teachers, especially Li laoshi 😄

The solid curriculum, facilities such as the mini water theme park and garden, sheltered dropoff, frequent app updates on the Champs’ learning journeys, and especially caring teachers (form teachers Ms Arina, 冯老师 as well as the rest of the school team such as Qian Laoshi, Desmond, Principal Alice etc) made all the difference and firmed our choice in selecting Mindchamps Bishan to kickstart our daughter’s formal education.
My child loved mindchamps, loved going to school and still remembers her teachers fondly. Minus one star for steep fees and for needing parents to spend extra, such as on recorder and violin etc.
Daughter has been enrolled since Jan 23. She looks forward to school and has made many friends.
Looking to give up our K2 2024 spot for this branch due to change in caregiving arrangements. Contact 9187 1468.
All thanks for the teachers and staff over at MC Bishan, my kid looks forward to school everyday. Kudos to teachers and staff!

Just 1 month in MindChamps, Teacher Sharmila and Qian Lao Shi have transformed her from a reluctant school-goer to a child who is super excited to go to school every morning. However what’s more valuable than her great development in her academic skills is knowing that Kinar is now a responsible, caring, confident, happy and sociable child. I am truly grateful! Thank you very much. - Niken Syiera Karina, parent of Kinar Ahalya K2
Thanks for making school fun and enjoyable for my little one! He looks forward to school everyday and coming back to share with us his day in school and what he has learnt.
My daughter love going to school everyday
Student to Teacher ratio is low and teachers’ responses are very prompt.
Excellent! My son was raving about the wonderful food he made during gourmet lessons!
My little one enjoyed going to preschool everyday. Thank you teachers.
Thank you for always taking every feedback given into consideration.
Experienced teacher. Great curriculum.
Good school"

"After four years at Mindchamps J10, my affection for this school has only grown stronger. I adore the close-knit community here..it feels like I’m reliving my own school days. From the sweetest teachers and principals to the wonderful parents, everyone is closely bonded. Last month, our class organized a food donation drive, which deeply touched both me and my daughter. It was incredibly meaningful to be able to help needy families in our community. From packing to sorting to distributing, we all worked together seamlessly. Studying here isn’t just about teachers and students..it feels like a second home. We’ve never once regretted choosing Mindchamps J10.

My son has been with MC10 since PG and he is K1 now. Super awesome and caring teachers and principal. Very appreciative of their dedication! Thank you to the MCM (MindChamps Music) teachers for taking the initiative by organizing an introductory session of the violin for the parents too. It was useful to us so that we can guide our Champs appropriately when they practice at home.

We recently participated in the food donation drive event organized by MindChamps, and it was an incredibly rewarding experience for our family. Not only did we have the opportunity to contribute to a worthy cause, but we also witnessed firsthand the positive impact it had on our child. Through this event, our child learned the importance of generosity, empathy, and community involvement. Seeing the joy on the faces of those who received our donations was truly heartwarming and left a lasting impression. We are grateful for the dedication and hard work of our child's teachers, Ms. Lydia and Shu Ling Lao Shi, and the center Principle, Ms. Sharlene who instill these values on a daily basis. Additionally, the support and involvement of the parent community around our child's class were instrumental in the success of the event. Thank you to MindChamps J10 for organizing such a meaningful event, and to everyone involved for their dedication and support. We look forward to participating again in the future!

My son has been w MC J10 for a year now. MC has great and dedicated teachers who teaches the value of respect and makes a point in remembering every child's name. 2 thumbs up to Teacher Doreen, gls & wls. We are very impressed. A very big thank you to the teachers & school for 101% effort, patience & hard work.
Definitely 100% efforts from the teachers to make all the events fun and exciting for the champs! Love the vibes from the teachers!
Super fun children’s day event. My kid is super enjoying the stay at MC JC10. Thank you all the teachers. Special shot out to Ms Eunice and Zhang Laoshi. 👍

Great school with very caring teachers and alot of effort in planning the excursions and special events, e.g. children day. Special shout out to Ms Doreen, Geng Lao shi, Ms Eunice and Zhang Lao shi. My children love the teachers very much 😍

We started our firstborn at Mindchamps J10 since Playgroup, and the curriculum has exposed her to opportunities for a holistic growth in the domains of language, cognitive development and socio-emotional skills. The school also provides a conducive environment for learning with its well thought-out and organized classrooms and facilities. She returns home excitedly every day and shares with us the activities and experiences she has gone through in school. Not only has she formed strong friendships with her classmates (us parents have formed great friendships too!), but also developed good rapport with her supportive teachers and even non-teaching staff. Communication between parents and teachers has always been transparent and prompt with the Mindchamps app, as we are constantly updated with our child’s progress and well-being in school. Her increasing independence and curiosity stand as evidence of the effectiveness of Mindchamp’s pedagogical approach and the professionalism of J10’s teaching team. Our secondborn started his school journey in July 2023. At just slightly over 6 months, we have noticed remarkable progress in his language, numeracy, and social interaction skills. With his new found friendships and deep bonds with the teachers, he is ecstatic to go to school every day and is loving and enjoying every moment in school. Thank you Mindchamps J10, for helping the 2 Js grow, learn and most importantly, for making their early school years memorable and cherished!

My boy has been with Mindchamps @ J10 for the past 3-4 years (from PlayGroup till K1 currently), and we have witnessed how he has learned and grown throughout his time at Mindchamps. The teaching staff are very meticulous in their work, and would tirelessly plan extra activities outside of the usual curriculum to allow the champs to learn in an experiential manner in different environments outside of the classroom. Curriculum aside, when we observe the champs interact outside of the classroom environment, we could tell that the teachers have inculcated a certain level of decorum expected of the champs in social interaction, and this is testament to the culture of the school, which is greatly influenced by how the school is run.

Our child has been with Mindchamps J10 since N1 and this has been the best decision we have made for him! He looks forward to school everyday which really makes us assured that he is well taken care of. Their K1 class recently organised a project “Give a Hand, Give a Can” where they collaborated with Fei Yue Active Ageing Centre to collect, pack and distribute donated food items and necessities for family in needs. It was heartwarming to see all the teachers and parents come together to contribute for this meaningful event. Through this, the kids had the opportunity to become community helpers for a day and learn how their small little action can make a significant difference in the lives of others. We highly recommend Mindchamps J10 to anyone looking for a childcare for their kids in this area! Thanks to all the wonderful teachers in doing such great jobs to care for our children!

We went to 4 preschools school tour before deciding to enrolled our girl over to j10 Mindchamps. What made us chose j10 MC : We love their new renovated playground, it is safe and sheltered. Kids can have water play, picnic and many fun activities there! As their playground is located out of the mall, We were worried that it might be too noisy.. so we went to check the traffic condition at several timing, and to our surprise, only peak hours about 5.30-6pm there was an increase of traffic. We also like how they communicate effectively with parents in their own school app. I get to see updates like - what time my girl enters school, temperature checking and more. So much thought and effort is put into the educational activities as well. I know my daughter loves being here, and i wouldn't take her anywhere else. We’re so happy with our decision. This is her year 1 and I’m sure she will enjoy her 5 years here. ❤️
Very nice teachers, my girl so lover her teachers.

My elder daughter started with MC @J10 since it 1st opened up in 2015. In a flash of an eye, 6yrs had passed and now my younger daughter is going to spend her last year in MC in 2022. I'm happy to see how my girls had developed overall throughout the years they had been in the centre (not just in studies, but even in the soft skills like leadership, adaptability, problem solving and social cohesiveness). We had always found the teachers and directors at MC @J10 to be approachable and genuine in wanting to care for the children under them (maybe we were just blessed that my 2 girls had great teachers). I had observed how improvements were made to the infrastructure over the years. I had seen the outdoor playground get refurbished into a garden area before a new playground was added as well. This makes water play so much more meaningful when we still remember how it originally was. With the addition of the Allied care centre below, I have no doubt that the centre's management is looking towards providing awesome care for a larger spectrum of children (including those who might need additional assistance to integrate better into mainstream education). Kudos to their foresight and planning! Here's to wishing MC @J10 and it's teaching staffs many more fantastic years ahead, creating better futures for our future generations! Sincerely, Benjamin Celeste and Adele's Daddy

We started our son Isaac at Mindchamps J10 when he was 1.5 years old, just before the Covid pandemic started. He showed great affinity for the school as he was attentive and curious while we were taking a tour of the campus – and since then he has embarked on a thrilling journey with the kindergarten. Mindchamps provides a conducive environment for Isaac to learn and grow over the years – he picked up social skills quickly and displays proficiency in both Mandarin and English (yes he even challenges our vocabulary now!) and it is evident he has a great love for music and reading. We especially appreciate the hard work put in by the teachers and staff at MindChamps J10 during the Covid period when classes were conducted online and regular updates were provided to parents through the Mindchamps app with lots of pictures and curriculum details. And the teachers put in a lot of effort to give us a detailed write up of what Isaac learns every term, not just in English but also in Chinese. We are very glad that we can share photos of what Isaac does in school everyday with his grandparents as well! Now Isaac looks forward to going to school every morning (Not just because of Fun Toast!) but he tells us that he looks forward to seeing his teachers and friends – so much so he wants to stay back after school hours to continue playing with his classmates. Thank you Mindchamps J10, for your love and dedication to Isaac! 😊

The school is located on the 2nd floor of the Junction 10 building. While I generally like the class schedule and the gym, I found the food being catered from elsewhere not so ideal. The fact the indoor gym is located next door means children have to put back their shoes to go to indoor gym classes, and take them off again. The outdoor playground is next to the junction, which is lots of traffic noises.

My child has been with the school for the past 4 years. Teachers are all very caring and nurturing, and always put in effort and support the child growth. More than happy to have my child enrolled here!

My daughter simply loves MindChamps! She is blessed to have met dedicated caring teachers who provided good care and guidance in her daily needs. A shout out to Ms Sharlene, Zhang Laoshi, Miss Jolynn, Miss Lim, Miss Esther and Miss Katy. Our Champ comes home with stories of your kindness, creativity, and the exciting activities you have all planned. It’s clear that they have not only been her teacher but also a source of inspiration and comfort. You’ve helped her grow, learn, and most importantly, feel safe and cherished in your care. I truly appreciate her teachers for making her preschool experience memorable and for being a positive influence in her life. Your impact reaches far beyond the classroom. Happy Children’s Day to the amazing Team of Teachers!

Amazing team of teachers, love their creativity in their planning for events and celebrations! So much fun for the children always! Thank you for the great effort put in, leaving precious memories for them!
We love the variety of enrichment activities. Our son enjoyed the music lessons. The exposure to different instruments is great, and helped him to discover his love for piano.

Excellent teacher crew with a caring principal. Student well being are well taken care of and parent could be at ease. Highly recommend: special shout out to n1 growth teacher , ms Doreen and Geng Lao Shi.
Fun and interactive activities done for Children's Day! My child has so much fun!

Thank you teachers (special shout-out to Ms Shakina, Yanfang Laoshi, Ms Esther, Ms Linda who have worked with us closely to ensure Thad adapted well to a whole new environment) for loving and nurturing our beloved child. What we find most amazing is the boy who used to cry at check-in every single day at his previous school, now wakes us up in the morning to send him to school asap so he can take part in all the activities/games/excursions that are planned. Thank you teachers and staff of Mindchamps J10!!

Even though our son Aydan has only been with MindChamps for 8 months since he was 1.5 years old, witnessing his remarkable growth in every aspect truly affirms MindChamps as our preschool of choice. Aydan enjoys going to school and this speaks volume on the school’s holistic curriculum and the dedicated teachers & staff. Learning is fun and interactive through play, music, art, gourmet, etc. The ease of communication with the teachers (with prompt replies) as well as regular updates/reports with pictures & videos via the MindChamps app is immensely useful and appreciated. The teachers and staff are always warm and friendly. As a parent, trust and assurance is crucial so that you can have a peace of mind, knowing your child is in good hands. The regular events organised by the school such as festival celebrations, field trips, etc not only provides Aydan a different kind of learning experience and exposure, it also fosters bonding between us & Aydan and with the teachers. We are sincerely grateful towards MindChamps and the J10 team for playing an important role in nurturing our next generation. The continued collaboration between us parents and MindChamps during Aydan's formative years will certainly stand him in good stead in future. Thank you MindChamps J10!

Kyler followed his elder brother and joined Mindchamps @J10 since Playgroup and this shows how confident we are with the Mindchamps program and the school at Junction 10. As parents, we are grateful and appreciative of the school and teachers' effort to take in our feedback and work together. Kyler used to have issues with pronunciation and was apprehensive of saying out new words. It was the school and teachers teamwork that helped nurture Kyler into a confident child. He is no longer afraid of pronouncing the word wrongly, and takes it as a challenge and enjoys the fun of learning.
